task.title: How to Apply
task.shortdesc: Applying for an internship can be a daunting task, but there are steps you can take to ensure that you are fully prepared.

step.cmd: Send your resume, cover letter, and any other necessary materials to the employer

info.note: Some employers may ask for writing samples
Check out the Career Planning Guide for resume and cover letter tips
Tips on preparing for interviews can be found at the Career Services site

step.cmd: Write the employer a thank you letter for the interview
After a few weeks, write the employer a follow up letter
If offered, accept or decline the offer

info.note: If you would like to take the internship for credit, speak with your advisor
